name: Twinsanity: Omicron
description:
STORY:

Twinsanity: Omicron is an RPG game which is based on the series "Twinsanity The Animated Series". The Story Continues. Two days after defeating Time Shadow, Twinsanity is taking rest in EastCity. Exploring the city, he realises that someone wants his power.  Are you ready to solve the mystery?

FEATURES:

-Hacking

-Unlockable Costumes

-Stop-Motion Cutscenes

-Frame by Frame Animation

-New Weapons and Items
